# NetworkProtocolCondition

This condition is true if the request satifies the specific network protocol configured below (protocol) that the policy is operating on. 

## Properties
Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**condition_type** | **str** | The discriminator for the condition | 
**protocol** | **str** | The specific protocol.  | 
**any string name** | **bool, date, datetime, dict, float, int, list, str, none_type** | any string name can be used but the value must be the correct type | [optional]
